job_tasks.phrase: Ontwerpen en implementeren van AI-oplossingen gebaseerd op large language models (LLM's).
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core task of creating and deploying AI solutions that are specifically based on large language models, aligning with the definition of developing or adapting models and creating AI solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyseren en voorbereiden van datasets voor optimale modelprestaties.
job_tasks.justification: This directly maps to the definition of preparing and managing data for model training and evaluation, including data analysis and preprocessing.

job_tasks.phrase: Verbeteren van de kwaliteit en nauwkeurigheid van tekstmodellen.
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on enhancing the performance of existing models, which falls under the scope of fine-tuning and improving model quality.

job_tasks.phrase: Testen, valideren en continu optimaliseren van ontwikkelde oplossingen.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the lifecycle management of developed solutions, including testing, validation, and optimization, which are core software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Zorgen voor een veilige en verantwoorde toepassing van AI-technologieën.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly addresses the responsibility and safety aspects of using AI technologies, aligning with the definition of ethical and legal considerations in AI.

soft_skills.phrase: Zorgen voor een veilige en verantwoorde toepassing van AI-technologieën.

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes tasks related to designing, implementing, and improving AI solutions based on large language models (LLMs) and text models, as well as preparing datasets for these models. These tasks fall predominantly under Macro-Category B (AI Specialization). While there is one task related to testing and optimizing developed solutions (1.A.1), the core focus remains on the AI aspects. The explicit mention of LLMs and text models, coupled with the dominance of AI-specific tasks over general software engineering tasks, leads to the 'GenAI Specialist' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is quite specific about the technologies (LLMs) and the types of tasks involved (designing AI solutions, data preparation, model improvement). The language is clear, although it is in Dutch with English technical terms. The tasks clearly point towards a specialization in GenAI rather than a balanced engineering role.
